page.description: The .a5tut extension is used for defining an interactive tutorial.

item.name: where
item.description: Fully Qualified identifier of action location in the UX.

item.name: message
item.description: HTML content to display associated with the control or subitem of a control identified by the 'where' property.

item.name: edge
item.description: Edge of control specified by the 'where' property to display the message (left, right, top, bottom).

item.name: exactMatch
item.description: For this step to complete, the value of the control specified by the 'where' property must match this value.

item.name: skipMatch
item.description: If the value of the control specified by the 'where' property matches this value, this step is skipped.

item.name: step
item.description: Identifies this as the last action in a 'step'.

item.name: menuSelect
item.description: Action is a menu selection , can be top menu or context menu or submenu.

item.name: controlChange
item.description: Action is result of user editing the value of a control.

item.name: controlSelect
item.description: Action is result of user selecting the value of a control.

item.name: controlClick
item.description: Action is the result of the user clicking on a control.

item.name: controlDoubleClick
item.description: Action is the result of the user double clicking on a control.

item.name: controlRightClick
item.description: Action is the result of the user right clicking on a control.

item.name: controlAny
item.description: Action is *any* action on a control (this is generally used in conjuction with an 'exactMatch' where a control value might be set via selection or editing).

item.name: viewActivate
item.description: Action is the result of the user selecting a diffent view, generally by clicking on the title section.
